from sympy import symbols, Eq, solve

def solve_task_with_sympy(equations, variables):
    var_symbols = symbols(variables)
    eq_objects = [Eq(*map(sympy.sympify, eq.split('='))) for eq in equations]
    solutions = solve(eq_objects, var_symbols)
    return solutions
